Headline: No trains between Kimball and Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to fire department activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Belmont due to fire department activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Belmont and Clark/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested from Kimball to Belmont provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
